description: Detects attempts to disable the Windows Firewall using PowerShell
author: Tim Rauch
name: Windows Firewall Disabled via PowerShell
query: (((process.executable.text:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe OR *\\powershell_ise.exe)) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"PowerShell.EXE")) AND (process.command_line.text:*Set\-NetFirewallProfile\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-Enabled\ * AND process.command_line.text:*\ False*) AND process.command_line.text:(*\ \-All\ * OR *Public* OR *Domain* OR *Private*))
